  • Field Details

    • backgroundColor

      public final zombie.core.Color backgroundColor
      Panel background color

  • Constructor Details

    • Panel

      public Panel(int posX, int posY, int width, int height, float r, float g, float b, float a)
      Creates a panel with specified location and color parameters
      Parameters:
      posX - horizontal X coordinate of the top left corner of the panel.
      posY - the vertical Y coordinate of the top left corner of the panel.
      width - the width of the panel in pixels.
      height - the height of the panel in pixels.
      r - red component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0.
      g - green component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0.
      b - blue component of the color, value from 0.0 to 1.0.
      a - the alpha component for transparency, a value from 0.0 (fully transparent) to 1.0 (fully opaque).
